title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: As content creation gains popularity and people start making it big from YouTube/ Facebook monetization, content creators are becoming increasingly desperate and are willing to do any content to gain followers.Pranking people on the street has become a common order with no consideration of the victim's emotional/psychological state of mind.While we watch these videos and enjoy the entertainment part of it, some of the people pranked are left emotionally drained, some relationship/ couples trust has broken because they were pranked to check there faithfulness to each other and some people have lost so much useful information from there phone because a popular prankster smatched it on the ground and gives the victim a new one, not considering some important information in the phone that might be lost in the process.Of course, some of these guys have landed themselves in trouble because they pranked the wrong person but others are yet to learn there lessons.Entertainment is not bad, as a matter of fact I enjoy watching them alot but when you ridicule or take advantage of the ignorance of others just to create your content, it becomes a problem.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on October 09, 2023, 06:44:08 AMPranking people on the street has become a common order with no consideration of the victim's emotional/psychological state of mind.It is actually disgusting seeing the extent some people go to create content. No safety measure in place for some of them and they can actually cause someone sick to have crisis. For example, this one uses fake snake to prank random people on the street. This is extremely dangerous! If they use only those among their crew for the prank, it would have been better to avoid any emergency. Besides, we already know it is just script they are acting. Quote from: Hewlet on October 09, 2023, 06:44:08 AMEntertainment is not bad, as a matter of fact I enjoy watching them alot but when you ridicule or take advantage of the ignorance of others just to create your content, it becomes a problem.I don't know if there are regulations to these things but I think government have to do more in this regards to avoid emergency. Content creators have to be guided by rules that guarantee public safety.

I am not supporting those pranksters for what they do to relationships, but it is better couples don’t take part in it since they won’t stop the prank as long as it is not regulated yet, and I don’t think they force people to take part in such prank activity with them.Quote from: Hewlet on October 09, 2023, 06:44:08 AMEntertainment is not bad, as a matter of fact I enjoy watching them alot but when you ridicule or take advantage of the ignorance of others just to create your content, it becomes a problem.I don’t know much about the entertainment industry but I think most of this stuffs are not under any regulations, so those pranksters have no limit to the type of content they create as long as it will give them money. The only time I see this comedians or pranksters been arrested are when they imitate some government officials and showcase the negative part of their work and share it to the public which is not a good illustration of what such government officials depicts, that is when they are been cautioned, warn or arrested.
